text: (nabiye!) ovunta darunu vada himsa gena diya hæki ayama ovun kerehi (adhipatyaya pavatvana men) avasana dina dakva ohu yavanu ætæyi obage deviyan (ovunta) nivedanayak nikut kirima gæna (oba ovunta) matak kara denu mænava!niyata vasayenma obage deviyan danduvam dimehi itamat tivravantayeki. namut niyata vasayenma ohu itamat ksama karanneku vasayenda, karunavantayeku vasayenda sitinneya
